sentences.english: Increases the movement speed and attack speed of the Lycanthropy.
sentences.chinese: 提升狼人的攻擊速度和移動速度。

sentences.english: Werewolves have been mentioned quite a bit in connection with Harry's Defence Against the Dark Arts teachers.
sentences.chinese: 狼人常常與哈利的黑魔法防禦術老師有很大的關係。

sentences.english: Garou society is older at its core than any human culture.
sentences.chinese: 狼人社會的重心遠比任何人類文雅久遠。

sentences.english: Silver Fang septs are scattered across the Garou Nation.
sentences.chinese: 銀牙氏族散佈於整個狼人世界。
狼人也許並不夠難以對付。

sentences.english: Yalom suffered werewolf kill, came to the palace to her sister has left here.
sentences.chinese: 亞隆遭遇狼人追殺，前來王宮勸姐姐妲已離開此地。

sentences.english: If werewolves are hunting vampires, I would know about it.
sentences.chinese: 如果狼人在捕食吸血鬼，我應該會發現的。

sentences.english: Alaric:U wanna hunt down a pack of wolves?
sentences.chinese: 你想在月圓之夜搜尋一羣狼人？

sentences.english: I hope to return to lycanthropy one day soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在不遠的一天回到狼人的故事。

sentences.english: Their allies almost always lie outside the Garou Nation.
sentences.chinese: 他們的盟友幾乎都不在狼人一族之中。

sentences.english: A werewolf is a make-believe half-man, half-wolf beast that can only be killed by a silver bullet.
sentences.chinese: 狼人是一種虛構的半人半狼獸，它只能被銀彈殺死。

sentences.english: More information on the Stargazers can be found in the Werewolf Storytellers Companion.
sentences.chinese: 他們的盟友幾乎都不在狼人一族之中。

sentences.english: Larry kills the werewolf but is bitten during the fight.
sentences.chinese: 賴瑞殺死狼人，但在戰鬥中被咬。

sentences.english: A pack of werewolves is worth more than 10 times its weight in enemies.
sentences.chinese: 一組狼人有相當他們數量十倍仇人的戰爭力。

definition: leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
blood relations/one's own flesh and blood/kin
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
